article_title: Alfred J. Martello: Faced with 'Vizzini's choice'

article_metadata.description: Hillary Clinton was giving a radio interview last week when she said something with which I can agree. Her favorite romantic comedy is a movie named "The Princess Bride." This has been one of my favorite movies since I was in college.The timing of the interview was ironic because I was starting to feel like Vizzini, the Sicilian genius, about the upcoming general election. In the movie, Vizzini is challenged to a battle of wits by Wesley, the movie’s hero. In this contest, Wesley places
